content.text:
## Analysis of the Main Target Image

The target structure appears to be a character or figure with the following characteristics:

- It has approximately 10 blocks arranged in multiple layers
- The structure has 4 distinct vertical layers
- The construction resembles a robot-like or character-like figure with a head, body, and legs

### Detailed description:
- Top layer (head): A red block with a U-shaped cutout, topped with two yellow curved/semicircular blocks
- Second layer (body): A tall orange cylindrical block in the center
- Third layer (waist): A yellow horizontal rectangular block connecting the body to the legs, with orange triangular blocks on either side
- Bottom layer (legs): Two blue cube blocks positioned as feet

## Required Blocks from the Dictionary

Based on my analysis, the following blocks are needed:

1. Head section:
   - Block #2 (red U-shaped block) - forms the main part of the head
   - Two of Block #11 (yellow semicircular/curved blocks) - forms the top of the head

2. Body section:
   - Block #8 (orange vertical cylinder) - forms the central body/torso

3. Waist/middle section:
   - Block #7 (yellow horizontal rectangular block) - forms the waist connector
   - Two triangular orange blocks (#15 and #16) - form the side parts at the waist

4. Leg section:
   - Two of Block #6 (blue cubes) - form the feet/base

## Assembly Order

```
{
   Step1: Move block with index 6
   Step2: Move block with index 6
   Step3: Move block with index 7
   Step4: Move block with index 15
   Step5: Move block with index 16
   Step6: Move block with index 8
   Step7: Move block with index 2
   Step8: Move block with index 11
   Step9: Move block with index 11
}
```

This assembly order moves from bottom to top, starting with the base (legs), then the middle section (waist and sides), followed by the body, and finally the head section with its decorative top pieces.
